attributes.action: Allow the Highways Agency Traffic Officer service t use the same motor vehicle database that the insurance companies use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow the Highways Agency Traffic Officer service to use the same motor vehicle database that the insurance companies use to gain make model colour details of vehicles involved in motorway breakdowns and accidents to assist drivers in being recovered by their own breakdown organisations, so there is no confusion over the type of vehicle that is at the scene of any of the above incidents

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
